Here are just 3 examples when I wore it: (these are 1000% true and not fabricated one bit)

When I went to a food drive thru, I handed this guy my card at the first window. I just drove off without my sauces because I didnt know what to do üòÇ

The next time I wore this stuff, my daughter and I went to our local flea market and wanted to shop all day and just get out of the house. We were there for about 2 hours and I cannot tell you how many times I got hit on, whistled at and just straight up ogled at. To the point my daughter and I even asked each other a few times what was going on here because that type of stuff never happened when we went. This guy walked up to us and asked if I was single (I had a wedding ring on), people were saying my daughter (who is 15) and I looked like sisters and at this one booth this guy gave us a discount for the "pretty ladies" üòÇüòÇ OK. I AM NOT GONNA LIE. THAT WAS NICE.

Another time I was in Walmart doing some grocery shopping and I was almost done I just needed to get waters for our house because my kids drink so so much of it. So as I was walking to the water aisle, I noticed this fit looking guy in the middle next to me standing there looking at the lunchmeat. But he was kind of eyeing me. I told him no thanks then turned around and once again said forget the waters because he blocked my path and I wanted to just get away.

But the oddest thing about this whole pheromone perfume is, my husband hasn't really noticed it much or should I say, hasn'tsnt RAVAGED me more because of it. title: Spoiler alert...It's raining men up in here
text:
It's my friend's birthday so I wanted to buy her something special and also something that makes her smell better. I thought about getting her a birthday card too but decided against it. Then I was like, why not?? so I bought her a card after all. I'm insecure about the card choice but feeling very confident about this "scent" for her. I saw some people ask if this was for men AND for women... If you're a man and you want other men crawling all over you, be my guest lol!

When I was reading the other reviews many women mentioned that their man couldn't get enough of this "scent", so I knew it would be perfect for my friend who hasn't had any sexual intercourse (she's had intercourse, just not sexual), in at least three days.

Fast forward to the "giving" of the "gift" lol. Is that funny, or is it just me?
At first she was totally offended and was like, ill paraphrase "what...the...dot...doggity dog?! are you trying to tell me something?" I ignored her because I was nervous so I just kept eating my nachos. When I had built up the courage, I said to her "I got you a card. A birthday card." I was still nervous, obviously. I think she knew I meant birthday card when I said 'card' the first time. On second thought, she DEFINITELY knew. But she played along like a sly little minx lol. My impression was that she liked the card but some people thought otherwise (its my word vs theirs at this point). One of the better cards I've written for sure. Reluctantly, she put on the "scent" because her mom taught her (through violence) to always be polite upon receiving a gift, especially if it's given to you by a man.

WHAT HAPPENED NEXT WILL BLOW YOUR MIND. SERIOUSLY.

It turns out she DID like my card. I have it on good authority. She didn't LOVE it but she definitely liked it. Rumor has it, she read it twice. TWICE! I should not have doubted myself.

Anyways, turns out the "scent" really works. She's had sexual intercourse every single day since then and it's been like 6 weeks. Not always with the same partner. She doesn't believe in monogamy, but there's one guy I think she likes and I bet she'd be down to boo up if he asked her to. She'd probably deny it, that clever witch.
How do I know how often she has sexual intercourse? she tells me. Could she be lying? Of course. Don't think I haven't thought about that. But I know her, she wouldn't lie about this. Would she lie about liking a birthday card? Sure (but also unlikely). Her weight? Absolutely. Being a raw vegan? I saw that sly minx clever witch at taco bell--and I don't think she was there for the scenery, if you know what I mean ;). I think she was eating there but she looks pretty generic so it could have been somebody else. But still. Would she lie to me about how often she has sexual intercourse? No way. Full stop. Period.

Five stars*****

title: It works. TL;DR at the bottom.
text:
Alright, so it looks like my scent glands are perfect for this product because I smell like a musky jolly rancher. It‚Äôs subtle but it smells great.

My husband has been struggling with his body in the bedroom so I bought this to help things along. It works. Let me tell you how.

I had this delivered maybe twenty minutes ago. He‚Äôs working from home, so he‚Äôs distracted and his head is full, you know how it is. I applied the stuff.

When I entered the office, he was walking back to his desk, but he stopped and came over. He kissed me very tenderly and sweetly for longer than he probably should have, with all his chats. He was smiling and his eyes were all cloudy - I had to push him off to get him going. Now he‚Äôs chatting with me, keeps getting distracted and is giving me these particular smiles. So. I‚Äôd say it works, especially because his anxiety has been getting in the way of even the small things like that. He‚Äôs definitely not thinking straight. üòâ

I should mention that he doesn‚Äôt know I‚Äôm wearing it and doesn‚Äôt even know I bought it, so no placebo going on.

Of course it‚Äôs not like I‚Äôve had this for long, obviously. If I remember to update, I will!

I‚Äôd like to comment on human pheromones, so this part is technically no longer review if you don‚Äôt want to read it. I do explain my reasoning for recommending the product if that interests you.

The science of human pheromones is a funky one because not every person can detect them. It used to be, at least it‚Äôs believed, that pheromones factored in much more in ancient times. Over the years we‚Äôve evolved not to need it so much.

Now, some people still maintain the ability to scent others. Personally, I‚Äôm one of them. My sense of smell and perception of others is pretty darn strong. My husband has it too, though his actual sense of smell is less. In fact, it could be that you yourself can‚Äôt pick up others at all. And that‚Äôs fine! You‚Äôve just evolved out of it.

Now, some people cry snake oil on these products for that very reason and for some of them, I‚Äôd agree, because it‚Äôs best to purchase pheromones that match with your natural body chemistry. If you‚Äôre born female, use products with copulin and other intrinsically female pheromones. Vicey versy for the men out there.

For transgender people, I‚Äôd like to assure you that it‚Äôs not going to make you seem more like your sex at birth. Pheromones don‚Äôt work that way, so if you‚Äôre nervous about it, don‚Äôt be.

It‚Äôs a science and a dicey one, but hey, it‚Äôs worth a shot if you have a little extra cash and not enough attention. Don‚Äôt over apply. You‚Äôre enhancing your natural scent, not replacing it.

TL;DR: Works for me, might not work for you because science. Less is more. Apply to one wrist, rub on neck and other wrist. Be gentle or you‚Äôll break up the scent. Do your homework.

title: Doesnt work for everyone..for me it the opposite
text:
I really wanted to love this stuff. Maybe for some people it works, or they like the smell, but that didn't happe for me. Actually it was quite the opposite...
-I received the bottle quickly and I ripped it open and dabbed it on as fast as I could. I immediately realized I only liked the smell of this stuff from a distance, and there was an odd smell hidden in between the pleasant ones. I can't describe it other than- ass?? I was like hmmm.. is that the pheromones? I didn't know what to expect I've since never worn pheromones. Luckily that scent actually fades out after a while and it smells generally good.

-Next test: how would my partner react? He always compliments my smell and never has it went unnoticed when I wear a new scent. Gurl...... I spent almost an hour doing the absolute most to waft the scent towards him and see if he would notice without me saying anything. Nothing. When I finally did and he leaned in closer to smell it... his reaction was like "oh cool." The worst response he's ever given me on any perfume.......
We actually fought later that night. It was something unrelated and I can't blame that on the scent, but I do remember in the moment the fact I was wearing this did cross my mind.

-Work: no customers complimented it or gave me more tips than usual. I started wearing my old perfume mixed with this one since it wears off quick as well and I just wanted to use this one up so I didn't waste my money. I showed my female coworker it and let her smell. She said "hmm. Weird" and didn't ask to use some like she has with any other perfume. She also agreed that there was a faint off putting smell if you smelled it too closely. I gave up and threw the bottle in my purse with no intention of using it again. I didn't put the lid on well so it then leaked out and dried up and i was honestly grateful it did. Yikes.

title: I'm not convinced it works
text:
First off I have to say I thought I would try this after searching for a perfume. I was intrigued when I came across this pheromone while in my search. I am always on Amazon and I LOVE reading reviews on products before I buy. Hopefully this helps someone else.

I have a high sex drive to begin with. My partner also has a healthy sex drive. We have a great relationship. This wasn't really needed but was super curious. I am all for him wanting to pounce on me 24/7 so if this little bottle can make him want me even more I'm ALL IN !
Yeah that didn't happen. If fact at first I was confused because I put this stuff on and he wasn't even paying attention to me at all. First couple days I started to question myself. We typically have sex no less than 3x a day and after putting this on it went to zero for a couple days. I really tested this stuff out. I'm still using it so I'll keep you posted if anything changes. We did have intercourse heavily while wearing this pheromone but drinks were involved so I don't feel that's a fair assessment.

Overall I say this stuff doesn't work. The smell is nice. I really like it just as a fruity scent to wear. It doesn't last long at all. It's oil based so rubs off quickly on anything. I felt the first time I tried to seduce him with this pheromone I was applying it all over. I felt I nearly took a bath in it. I live in a humid place so I just kept sweating this stuff off. I was trying to get all pretty for my man while waiting for him to get home from work. Hoping he would smell me and want to pounce me like a untamed lion. Nope! Not at all. WTH! By the time he got home I had to reapply 10x since it just kept sweating off or the oils evaporated lol no idea. Needles to say I'll stick to my banana rum because that seems to work better than this stuff. I won't be ordering again but I did enjoy the little experiment. My husband still has no clue about any of this.
